Text:
Peter Green was the founder of Fleetwood Mac;
named, it seems, for mick FLEETWOOD and John MCvie....former bluesbreakers.
They should have been named GREENWOOD MAC

This album originally released in 1970

correct me if I'm wrong

ORIGINAL RELEASE DATES

1970:  LP   End of the game

1982:  LP   White sky

This is the way I would label this folder:

Peter Green - The End Of The Game (1970) + White Sky (1982) [1990]
